players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana, be cautious. I know your role."
Charlie: "Bob, thanks for the warning. Any tips on how to spot mafia?"
Diana: "I'll watch you, Bob. Stay safe, Charlie."
Charlie: "Thanks for the tips, Bob & Diana. Investigate Alice & me, looking for mafia."
You: "Charlie, watch Diana; she knows I'm the detective. Alice or Charlie could be mafia."
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana; she might be hiding something."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
